paragraphs.text:
%md
# Generating Data

result.msg: Generating Data

paragraphs.text:
val rdd = sc.parallelize(Array(1,2,3,4,5))
print(rdd.collect().mkString(","))

result.msg:
rdd: org.apache.spark.rdd.RDD[Int] = ParallelCollectionRDD[160] at parallelize at <console>:55
1,2,3,4,5

paragraphs.text:
val rdd = sc.parallelize(1 to 31 by 3)
print(rdd.collect().mkString(","))

result.msg:

paragraphs.text:

print(rdd.collect().mkString(","))

result.msg:

# Loading Data from HDFS

rdd.collect().take(10).foreach(println)

almost no restrictions whatsoever.  You may copy it, give it away or

%md
# Simple Transformations

result.msg: Simple Transformations

paragraphs.text:
val rdd = sc.parallelize(1 to 10)
val result = rdd.map(x => x*x)

print(result.collect.mkString(","))

val words = result.take(20)

words.foreach(x => println(x.mkString(",")))

paragraphs.text:
%md
# Filtering Data

result.msg: Filtering Data

paragraphs.text:
val rdd = sc.parallelize(1 :: 2 :: 3 :: 4 :: 5 :: Nil)
val result = rdd.filter(_ % 2 == 0)

result.collect().foreach(println)

result.msg:
rdd: org.apache.spark.rdd.RDD[Int] = ParallelCollectionRDD[3] at parallelize at <console>:29
result: org.apache.spark.rdd.RDD[Int] = MapPartitionsRDD[4] at filter at <console>:31
2
4

paragraphs.text:
%md
# Aggregations

result.msg: Aggregations

paragraphs.text:
val rdd = sc.parallelize(1 to 10)
println(s"Count=${rdd.count()}")
println(s"Sum=${rdd.sum()}")
println(s"Mean=${rdd.mean()}")
println(s"Min=${rdd.min()}")
println(s"Max=${rdd.max()}")
println(s"Variance=${rdd.variance()}")
println(s"Stddev=${rdd.stdev()}")
println(s"SampleVariance=${rdd.sampleVariance()}")
println(s"SampleStddev=${rdd.sampleStdev()}")

result.msg:
rdd: org.apache.spark.rdd.RDD[Int] = ParallelCollectionRDD[9] at parallelize at <console>:29
Count=10
Sum=55.0
Mean=5.5
Min=1
Max=10
Variance=8.25
Stddev=2.8722813232690143
SampleVariance=9.166666666666666
SampleStddev=3.0276503540974917

paragraphs.text:

val result = rdd.stats()

println(result)

%md
# Making Data Distinct

result.msg: Making Data Distinct

paragraphs.text:
val rdd = sc.parallelize(List('b','a','c','c','a'))
val result = rdd.distinct()

println(result.collect().mkString(","))

result.msg:
rdd: org.apache.spark.rdd.RDD[Char] = ParallelCollectionRDD[37] at parallelize at <console>:29
result: org.apache.spark.rdd.RDD[Char] = MapPartitionsRDD[40] at distinct at <console>:31

paragraphs.text:
%md
# Working with Key-Value Data

result.msg: Working with Key-Value Data

paragraphs.text:
val rdd = sc.parallelize(Array(("a",1), ("b",3), ("c", 17), ("b", 23), ("c",12)))
val keys = rdd.keys.distinct().collect()

keys.foreach(k => println(s"Key=${k} Value=" + rdd.lookup(k).mkString(",")))

result.msg:
rdd: org.apache.spark.rdd.RDD[(String, Int)] = ParallelCollectionRDD[99] at parallelize at <console>:29
keys: Array[String] = Array(b, a, c)
Key=b Value=3,23
Key=a Value=1
Key=c Value=17,12

paragraphs.text:
val rdd = sc.parallelize(Array(("a" -> 1), ("b" -> 3), ("c" -> 17), ("b" -> 23), ("c" -> 12)))
val result = rdd.mapValues(x => x*x)

println(result.collect().mkString(","))

result.msg:

# Sampling and Splitting

result.msg: Sampling and Splitting

val result = rdd.sample(false, 0.8, seed=124)
println(result.count())

result.msg:

paragraphs.text:
val rdd = sc.parallelize(0 to 1000)
val Array(a,b) = rdd.randomSplit(Array(8,2), seed=12)

println(s"#A: ${a.count()}")
println(s"#B: ${b.count()}")

paragraphs.text:
%md
# Storing Data

result.msg: Storing Data

paragraphs.text:
val rdd = sc.parallelize(0 to 100)
rdd.saveAsTextFile("/user/zeppelin/numbers")

result.msg: rdd: org.apache.spark.rdd.RDD[Int] = ParallelCollectionRDD[188] at parallelize at <console>:29

paragraphs.text:
%sh
hdfs dfs -getmerge /user/zeppelin/numbers /tmp/numbers.txt
cat /tmp/numbers.txt | head -n10

%md
# WordCount Revisited

result.msg: WordCount Revisited

paragraphs.text:
val text = sc.textFile("s3://is24-data-dev-spark-training/data/alice")
val words = text.flatMap(_.split(" "))
    .filter(_ != "")
    .map(x => (x,1))
    .reduceByKey(_ + _)
    .sortBy(_._2, ascending=false)
    .map({ case (k,v) => k + ':' + v.toString() })
    
words.saveAsTextFile("/user/zeppelin/alice_counts")

result.msg:
text: org.apache.spark.rdd.RDD[String] = s3://is24-data-dev-spark-training/data/alice MapPartitionsRDD[220] at textFile at <console>:29
words: org.apache.spark.rdd.RDD[String] = MapPartitionsRDD[230] at map at <console>:38

paragraphs.text:
%sh
hdfs dfs -getmerge /user/zeppelin/alice_counts /tmp/alice_counts.txt
cat /tmp/alice_counts.txt | head -n20
